author-notes.corresp: *Address correspondence to Catherine E. Oldenburg, Francis I. Proctor Foundation, University of California, San Francisco, 513 Parnassus Ave., San Francisco, CA 94143. E-mail: catherine.oldenburg@ucsf.edu

fn.p: Financial support: The studies included in this analysis were supported by the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation (T. M. L.) and the National Eye Institute (U10 EY016214; T. M. L.). The funders had no role in the study design, analysis, interpretation of data, or decision to publish.
Disclaimer: Results presented in part at World Health Organization, Montreaux, Switzerland, March 2018.

Authors’ addresses: Catherine E. Oldenburg, Jeremy D. Keenan, Thomas M. Lietman, and Travis C. Porco, Francis I Proctor Foundation, University of California, San Francisco, San Francisco, CA, and Department of Ophthalmology, University of California, San Francisco, San Francisco, CA, E-mails: catherine.oldenburg@ucsf.edu, jeremy.keenan@ucsf.edu, tom.lietman@ucsf.edu, and travis.porco@ucsf.edu.
